channel.title: PSA: Device limit exceeded account issue for users on version 0.99.9 HF5
channel.description: Visit SmoothWAN WebUI -> Services -> TTYD, enter `root` as username and your web UI password, then paste the following and hit enter: ``` cp /var/lib/dbus/machine-id /etc/machine-id ``` Close the tab and reboot. Send an email to Speedify to reset limits. Fixed next release. Affects Speedify 13.0.1+ users.

item.title: PSA: Device limit exceeded account issue for users on version 0.99.9 HF5
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Visit SmoothWAN WebUI → Services → TTYD, enter root as username and your web UI password, then paste the following and hit enter:

cp /var/lib/dbus/machine-id /etc/machine-id

Close the tab and reboot.
Send an email to Speedify to reset limits.
Fixed next release.
Affects Speedify 13.0.1+ users.

Read full topic
item.source: PSA: Device limit exceeded account issue for users on version 0.99.9 HF5
